background: Oversees ERR’s factual slate, commissioning documentaries on Estonian culture, society and history. Supports content with strong public interest, cultural relevance and European co-production potential.
thematic_priorities: Contemporary societal change and regional issues
content_not_wanted: Projects without clear Estonian or regional relevance
budget_parameters: Range: €10K–€80K per hour Higher with co-productions
current_calls: Projects on Estonian heritage and identity
submission_process: Proposal including theme, format, public value and target audience
name: Tiina Kaalep
